verbs.description: Seven world leaders [V: are] meeting in Canada over the weekend with the backdrop of US President Donald Trump 's escalating trade battle with Canada and the EU and his advocacy of bringing Russia back into the group .

[ARG0: Seven world leaders] are [V: meeting] [ARGM-LOC: in Canada] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] [ARGM-ADV: with the backdrop of US President Donald Trump 's escalating trade battle with Canada and the EU and his advocacy of bringing Russia back into the group] .

Seven world leaders are meeting in Canada over the weekend with the backdrop of US President Donald Trump 's [V: escalating] [ARG1: trade] battle with Canada and the EU and his advocacy of bringing Russia back into the group .
